feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing SVG converter feature IDs, titles, related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend source file's purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and script loading the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper with theme provider, header, converter section, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ConverterSection: Handles SVG path input, independent path/polygon conversion, error tracking, and preview/output layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header showing app title, description, and scissors icon.
frontend/src/components/InputSection.tsx: Provides text and file-based SVG path input with quality selector and error display.
frontend/src/components/OutputSection.ts: Shows converted path() and polygon() outputs with copy buttons and format-specific errors.
frontend/src/components/PreviewSection.t: Renders SVG and clip-path previews with tabs for input/output and path/polygon formats, handling errors and missing outputs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions using Internet Identity, managing AuthClient creation, login, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating backend queries are not needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light/dark modes with custom OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/pathConverter.ts: Converts SVG paths to CSS clip-path path() or polygon() formats, including validation, tokenization, and curve/arc flattening.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in query and identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, utilities, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, and known issues for an SVG‑to‑CSS clip‑path converter tool, highlighting broken polygon conversion and UI/preview requirements. Serves as a structured specification guiding fixes and feature updates.
